input: Mangga kula madangi satunggil cerite babagan panda.
method1_output:
Di suatu desa yang terletak di tengah hutan, hiduplah seorang petani bernama Kula. Kula sangat gemar menanam berbagai jenis tanaman di kebunnya, termasuk buah mangga. Setiap musim panen, Kula selalu memanen buah mangga yang lezat dan manis.

Namun suatu hari, hewan liar seperti panda mulai datang ke kebun Kula untuk mencuri buah mangganya. Kula sangat kesal dan bingung bagaimana cara mengusir panda-panda itu tanpa membunuh mereka.

Suatu malam, Kula memutuskan untuk tidur di kebunnya untuk memantau situasi. Tiba-tiba, dia terkejut melihat seekor panda datang dan mulai memakan buah mangga. Kula merasa sangat kesal dan langsung berdiri dan mengusir panda itu dengan batang kayu. Panda itu melarikan diri.

Namun pada keesokan harinya, Kula merasa sangat bersalah karena telah mengusir panda itu begitu kasar. Dia berpikir untuk menemukan cara lain yang lebih ramah binatang untuk mengusir panda dari kebun mangganya.

Setelah berbagai percobaan, Kula akhirnya menemukan solusinya. Dia membuat pagar bambu tinggi yang melingkupi kebun mangganya dan juga memasang beberapa jerat untuk menangkap hewan liar yang mencoba mencuri buah di dalam kebun. Hal ini berhasil mengusir panda dan hewan liar lain dari kebun mangganya tanpa membahayakan mereka.

Akhirnya, Kula berhasil menjaga kebun mangganya dari serangan hewan liar dengan cara yang ramah binatang. Dia merasa puas dan gembira karena bisa memanen buah mangga yang lezat dan sehat dengan aman.
****************English Meaning****************
In a village located in the middle of a forest, lived a farmer named Kula. Kula was very fond of planting various types of plants in his garden, including mangoes. Every harvest season, Kula always harvested delicious and sweet mangoes.

However, one day, wild animals like pandas started coming to Kula's garden to steal his mangoes. Kula was very upset and confused about how to drive away the pandas without killing them.

One night, Kula decided to sleep in his garden to monitor the situation. Suddenly, he was surprised to see a panda come and start eating the mangoes. Kula felt very angry and immediately stood up and drove away the panda with a wooden stick. The panda ran away.

But the next day, Kula felt very guilty for driving away the panda so roughly. He thought of finding another more animal-friendly way to drive away the panda from his mango garden.

After various trials, Kula finally found the solution. He made a high bamboo fence that surrounded his mango garden and also installed some traps to catch wild animals that tried to steal fruit in the garden. This successfully drove away the pandas and other wild animals from his mango garden without endangering them.

Finally, Kula managed to keep his mango garden safe from the attack of wild animals in an animal-friendly way. He felt satisfied and happy because he could safely harvest delicious and healthy mangoes.
method2_step1_output: I would like to tell a story about a panda.
method2_step2_output:
Once upon a time, there was a panda named Ming. Ming lived in a beautiful forest in China surrounded by bamboo trees. He spent his days munching on bamboo, playing with his panda friends, and exploring the forest.

One day, while exploring the forest, Ming heard a loud noise. It sounded like someone crying for help. Ming quickly followed the sound and found a small bird stuck in a trap. The bird had injured its wing and was unable to fly.

Ming knew he had to help the bird. He carefully opened the trap and gently lifted the bird out of it. He then took the bird to his home in the bamboo forest. Ming carefully tended to the bird's wing, giving it food and water.

Days turned into weeks, and Ming looked after the bird every day. The bird finally regained its strength and could fly again. Ming was happy to see his friend get back to flying again. However, the bird was so grateful to Ming that it decided to stay with him.

From then on, the bird and Ming became the best of friends. The bird would chirp and flutter around Ming, while Ming would protect and care for the bird. They were always together, exploring the forest and enjoying the beauty around them.

Years went by, and Ming grew old. Eventually, he passed away peacefully in his sleep. The little bird was heartbroken and decided to spend the rest of his days in the bamboo forest, cherishing the memories of his best friend, Ming.

The forest still echoes with the memories of their friendship, and even today, people can see the bird flying around the bamboo forest. Some say that the bird still looks after the pandas, just like Ming did when he was alive.
method2_final_output:
Salah sawijining dina, ana panda sing nganggo jeneng Ming. Ming nglirak ing hutan sing cantik ing Cina sing diapit dening pohon bamboo. Saiki Ming ndelok barangan bamboo, main nganggo sahabat panda, lan eksplorasi hutan.

Siji dina, saiki Ming eksplorasi hutan, yaiku ndenger suara gedhe. Kayane wong ngandhut tulong. Ming cepet nyusuli suara iki lan nemokake loro klepung ingklep. Klepung iku kebasan pasingngatan lan ora bisa nunggal.

Ming loro-loro kudu nglampahi klepung. Ana kayu Ming nglebokake klepung tur bagedhi klepung saking klepangan. Ming loro-loro kudu neliti dingu klepung, nuduhake kae lan ngasi pangan lan banyu.

Wiwitane sun gegayutan nganti minggu, Ming mbalikake klepung saben dina. Klepung akhire nanggapi kahanan lan bisa nunggal. Ming seneng ngendi teman iki nganti bisa nunggal ngarep liwat. Akan tetapi, klepung iku lumayan sarjana ing Ming sing ngrasa kasihatan.  
Padha mulai tansah nyekson ngendi ing hutan bamboo. Klepung bakal ngirup lan gibol-bol ngendi Ming, nalika Ming bakal nelakoni lan nguruske klepung. Wiwit ora duweing Ming nganti Ming iki bisa ngendani kae lan padha ora bakal duweing teman klepung.

Banyak taun sing dolan, Ming wis padha tuwa. Sabanjure Ming bebarengan nanggleng durung padha ngguyu ing suwe. Klepung kecil sakit ati lan mesthi angsal padha nang hutan bamboo, ndadekke kenangan sahabat padha sing paling apik, Ming.

Hutan iki tetep memirsa yen kenangan sahabat padha entuk kancana, lan saiki wong bisa ndelok klepung mbledos ing hutan bamboo. Sawise padha nyenengi yen klepung tetep nglampahi panda, kaya Ming dadi padha prabawa.

input: Mangga nganyari rancangan pamugaran interior nanging ana ing gaya Nordik.
method1_output:
Rancangan pamugaran interior yang mengusung gaya Nordik menghadirkan kesederhanaan dan kebersihan dalam desainnya. Salah satu caranya adalah dengan menggunakan bahan-bahan alami seperti kayu, batu, dan kain linen. Selain itu, warna yang digunakan juga akan didominasi oleh warna netral seperti putih, hitam, dan abu-abu.

Untuk memperkaya tampilan, anda bisa memberikan sentuhan aksen warna-warna terang seperti biru laut, hijau, atau merah jambu muda. Hal ini bisa dilakukan misalnya dengan memberikan bantal-bantal atau karpet berwarna-warni.

Elemen penting lainnya dalam rancangan gaya Nordik adalah keteraturan. Segala hal dari furnitur hingga aksesoris harus ditempatkan dengan rapi dan teratur. Ini bisa dicapai dengan memilih furnitur dengan ukuran yang proporsional dan sanggup memaksimalkan ruang.

Jika memungkinkan, buka jendela untuk memberikan akses cahaya alami ke ruangan anda. Cobalah memilih gorden tipis dan mudah digulung pada siang hari, sehingga cahaya matahari sanggup masuk hingga ke dalam ruangan.

Secara keseluruhan, rancangan pamugaran interior gaya Nordik akan memberikan kesan ruangan yang hangat, nyaman, dan bersih. Ini cocok bagi anda yang mencari suasana rumah dengan tampilan yang klasik dan universal.
****************English Meaning****************
An interior decoration plan that embraces Nordic style brings simplicity and cleanliness in its design. One way to achieve this is by using natural materials such as wood, stone, and linen fabric. In addition, the colors used will also be dominated by neutral colors such as white, black, and gray.

To enrich the appearance, you can add touches of bright accent colors such as sea blue, green, or light pink. This can be done, for example, by adding colorful pillows or carpets.

Another important element in Nordic style design is tidiness. Everything from furniture to accessories must be placed neatly and orderly. This can be achieved by choosing furniture with proportional sizes that can maximize space.

If possible, open the windows to provide access to natural light in the room. Try choosing thin and easily rolled curtains during the day so that sunlight can enter and illuminate the room.

Overall, the Nordic style interior decoration plan will provide a warm, comfortable, and clean room impression. This is suitable for those of you who are looking for a classic and universal home atmosphere.
method2_step1_output: They plan to do interior decoration, but in Nordic style.
method2_step2_output: The interior decoration plan entails using furniture and accessories that fit into the Nordic style. This includes materials such as light wood, minimalist design, neutral colors, and natural textures. The furniture should be functional, comfortable, and aesthetically pleasing. The decor should be simple yet beautiful, using items such as candles, plants, and textured fabrics to add depth and warmth to the space. The goal of the Nordic style is to create a cozy and inviting environment that is both functional and visually appealing.
method2_final_output: Rencana dekorasi interior meliputi penggunaan furnitur dan aksesori yang cocok dengan gaya Nordic. Ini termasuk bahan seperti kayu ringan, desain minimalis, warna netral, dan tekstur alami. Furnitur harus berfungsi, nyaman, dan estetis. Dekorasi harus sederhana namun indah, menggunakan barang seperti lilin, tanaman, dan kain tekstur untuk menambah kedalaman dan kehangatan pada ruang tersebut. Tujuan dari gaya Nordic adalah untuk menciptakan lingkungan yang nyaman dan mengundang yang fungsional dan menarik secara visual.

input: Miwiti algoritma mesin vektor dukungan ing nganggo Python.
method1_output:
Algoritma Mesin Vektor Dukungan (SVM) mung salah sawijining model panganggoan kang luwih populer kanggo kategori masalah klasifikasi. SVM munggah bisa digunakake kanggo masalah regresi lan deteksi anomali.

Nganggo Python, kita bisa make librarI sklearn lan numpy kanggo ngaplikasikake SVM. Nalika ngaplikasikake SVM, ana pitakon utama kang kudu diatasi, maringi:

1. Ngumpulake data lan ngekstrak fitur
2. Ngadegake model SVM
3. Nerapake model ing data trening
4. Ngetes model ing data pengujian

Contone kodi nganggo Python kanggo nduwur:

#1. Ngumpulake data lan ngekstrak fitur
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd

data = pd.read_csv('data.csv')
X = data.iloc[:, :-1].values
y = data.iloc[:, -1].values

#2. Ngadegake model SVM
from sklearn.svm import SVC

model = SVC(kernel='linear', random_state=0)

#3. Nerapake model ing data trening
model.fit(X, y)

#4. Ngetes model ing data pengujian
X_test = np.array([[4, 6, 3, 2], [5, 3, 1, 3]])
y_pred = model.predict(X_test)

print(y_pred)

Nalika program dijalukake, kita bakal mbukak file data csv trader uga kita nggawe ndamel fitur lan label. Sajeroning contone ing ngisor, sampel cocog digambarake minangka array numpy, nanging data asli bisa mlebu jinis sumber data liyane.

Kita bisa ngadegake model SVM nganggo class SVC kanggo kelasifikasi (kernel='linear') lan lanjutake ngolah dataset trening. Akeh pitakon kang bisa digunakan kanggo ngoptimalkan model lan nagasekake hipotesis sing cocog.

Data pengujian disimpen minangka array numpy lan diproses nggunakake model SVM kang wis nganggo fitur lan label dari data trening. Output nyatakan minangka label data pengujian, ing contone ini [1, 0], luwih tepatnya, model SVM menggunakan pengelompokan linier kang cocog kanggo kuwi fitur lan label.

Kanggo ngoptimalkake SVM lan ngukur akurasine, kita bakal nggunakake teknik cross-validation kang bisa nggawekek data trening kang luwih bener. Sklearn uga nuduhake cross_val_score kang bisa ngitung akurasi kros-validasi ing ngisor kode Python:

from sklearn.model_selection import cross_val_score

scores = cross_val_score(model, X, y, cv=5)
print("Accuracy: %0.2f (+/- %0.2f)" % (scores.mean(), scores.std() * 2))

Ngoperasikaken kode Python ing ngisor bakal ngitung ngisor akurasi kros-validasi model SVM, sampeyan bisa ngrungokake data validasinipun diuji minangka lumusane kanthi luwih persis lan konsisten.
****************English Meaning****************
Support Vector Machine (SVM) algorithm is one of the most popular models used for classification problems. SVM can also be used for regression and anomaly detection.

In Python, we can use libraries such as sklearn and numpy to apply SVM. When applying SVM, there are main questions that need to be addressed:

1. Collecting data and extracting features
2. Building an SVM model
3. Applying the model to training data
4. Testing the model on test data

Below is an example code using Python:

#1. Collecting data and extracting features
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd

data = pd.read_csv('data.csv')
X = data.iloc[:, :-1].values
y = data.iloc[:, -1].values

#2. Building an SVM model
from sklearn.svm import SVC

model = SVC(kernel='linear', random_state=0)

#3. Applying the model to training data
model.fit(X, y)

#4. Testing the model on test data
X_test = np.array([[4, 6, 3, 2], [5, 3, 1, 3]])
y_pred = model.predict(X_test)

print(y_pred)

When the program is executed, we will open the csv data file and use it to create features and labels. In the example below, the sample is depicted as a numpy array, but the actual data can come from other types of data sources.

We can build an SVM model using the SVC class for classification (kernel='linear') and proceed to process the training dataset. There are many questions that can be used to optimize the model and test hypotheses that fit.

The test data is stored as a numpy array and processed using the SVM model that has already used the features and labels from the training data. The output represents the label of the test data, in this case [1,0], more precisely, the SVM model uses a linear grouping that fits the features and labels.

To optimize SVM and measure its accuracy, we will use cross-validation techniques to make the training data more accurate. Sklearn also provides cross_val_score, which can calculate cross-validation accuracy in the following Python code:

from sklearn.model_selection import cross_val_score

scores = cross_val_score(model, X, y, cv=5)
print("Accuracy: %0.2f (+/- %0.2f)" % (scores.mean(), scores.std() * 2))

Operating the Python code above will calculate the cross-validation accuracy of the SVM model, and you can check the validation data as a more precise and consistent result.
method2_step1_output: Starting the Support Vector Machine algorithm using Python.
method2_step2_output:
To start Support Vector Machine (SVM) algorithm using Python, we first need to import the necessary libraries. The main libraries required for implementing SVM are NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, and Scikit-learn. These libraries can be installed using pip command if not already installed.

Once the libraries are imported, we can load the dataset and split it into testing and training datasets. Then, we can create an instance of the SVM algorithm and fit it on the training dataset. Finally, we can evaluate the performance of the algorithm on the testing dataset.

Here is a sample code to get started with SVM algorithm using Python:

```
# Importing necessary libraries
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from sklearn import svm, datasets
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score, classification_report, confusion_matrix

# Loading the iris dataset
iris = datasets.load_iris()

# Creating a dataframe
df = pd.DataFrame(iris.data, columns=iris.feature_names)
df['target'] = iris.target

# Splitting the dataset into training and testing datasets
X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(df[iris.feature_names], df['target'], random_state=0)

# Creating an instance of SVM algorithm
svm = svm.SVC(kernel='linear')

# Fitting the model on training dataset
svm.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Making predictions on testing dataset
y_pred = svm.predict(X_test)

# Evaluating the performance of the algorithm
print("Accuracy:", accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred))
print("Confusion matrix:\n", confusion_matrix(y_test, y_pred))
print("Classification report:\n", classification_report(y_test, y_pred))
```

In this example, we have used the iris dataset provided by scikit-learn. We have split the dataset into training and testing datasets using the train_test_split function. We have used the SVM algorithm with a linear kernel to fit on the training dataset. Finally, we have evaluated the performance of the algorithm on the testing dataset using accuracy, confusion matrix, and classification report.
method2_final_output:
Supaya bisa muni Support Vector Machine (SVM) algoritma gunakake Python, kita mesthi ndhukung kita ategeske pitulung perpustakaan. Perpustakaan utama sing diperlukan kanggo megimplementasikan SVM yaiku NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, lan Scikit-learn. Perpustakaan iki bisa diinstal nganggo perintah pip yadi data munggah dadi diinstal.

Sesuk wit, maneh kita bisa nggawa set data lan ngotekake nang tes lan latihan. Nganti saiki, kita bisa mbuat pogaru SVM lan melatihake trainings set data. Nanging nganti sehari-hari, kita bisa irep performa algoritma nang set data tes.

Ing ngisor iki yaiku kode sampel kanggo mulai nang algoritma SVM nggunakake Python:

```
# Nduking perpustakaan sing dibutuhake
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from sklearn import svm, datasets
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score, classification_report, confusion_matrix

# Megawang dataset iris
iris = datasets.load_iris()

# Mbentuk dataframe
df = pd.DataFrame(iris.data, columns=iris.feature_names)
df['target'] = iris.target

# Ngotekake dataset nang tes lan latihan
X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(df[iris.feature_names], df['target'], random_state=0)

# Mbentuk kanthi SVM algoritma
svm = svm.SVC(kernel='linear')

# Melatihake model nang trainings set data
svm.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Ngasilake prakiraa nang set data tes
y_pred = svm.predict(X_test)

# Irepe performa algoritma
print("Accuracy:", accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred))
print("Confusion matrix:\n", confusion_matrix(y_test, y_pred))
print("Classification report:\n", classification_report(y_test, y_pred))
```

Ing contone iki, kita wis nggunakake set data iris sing dibedhake dening scikit-learn. Kita nerapake set data nang tes lan latihan nganggo fungsi train_test_split. Kita nggunakake algoritma SVM karo kernel linear kanggo nglatihake set data latihan. Nganti saiki, kita ngukur performa algoritma nang tes set data nganggo akurasi, matriks konfusi, lan laporan kelasifikasi.

input:
Mugi titel iki dilenakake saka isin ing ngisor iki: CBA Ndeleng Tim Dheweke Lan Pelatih Kanggo "Main Negatif" ing Playoff

Ing tanggal 17 April, Chinese Basketball Association ngadakan briefing media kanggo menehi hukuman kanggo tim Shanghai Jushilong Lions lan Suzhou Kenitex. Tim-tim iki dihukum minangka "main negatif" nalika nduweni duwa game pungkasan ing playoff CBA. Sebagai akibaté, CBA ndhéwékéng penolaké ranking lan partisipasi utawa sèlèkéhé 5 yuta yuan kanggo masing-masing tim. Pelatih tim-tim énggoné uga kena pidho, Li Chunjiang lan Li Nan, pelatih kepala Shanghai Jushilong lan Suzhou Kenitex, nyuda lisensi ngajar nyawa limang lan telung taun. Shilinjie, manajer umum Kenitex, lan Jiang Yusheng, manajer umum Jushilong, uga kena nyalah-nyalah nganti limang lan telung taun. Kadhangkala, ronde kaloro playoff CBA musim iki bakal babaritaken mèmbèn waktu dénéng sparring antara Shenzhen Marco Polo lan Shanghai Jushilong. Ana wong sing bakal dirampungaken nggawe penampilan otomatis kanggo semifinal. Zhang Xiong, CEO CBA, nuduhaké manèhna kanggo régulasi disiplin kanthi tëmbung lan miturut sikap lan katindakan pelanggar. Yao Ming, Ketua CBA, uga mènèhi képrihatinané ing saindenging ganjaran, kagem pentingë kéhormatan ing olahraga sajroning kawandahan wusaké. Manèhna banjur ningali léwat acara iki rega ngandhapaké lan mèlu ragam lan jenengun kanggo menghasilaké data kowehe.
method1_output:
Artikel ini membahas hukuman yang diberikan oleh Chinese Basketball Association kepada tim Shanghai Jushilong Lions dan Suzhou Kenitex karena dianggap bermain negatif pada dua pertandingan playoff terakhir CBA. Kedua tim dilarang untuk berpartisipasi dalam ranking CBA serta dikenakan denda 5 juta yuan. Pelatih kepala dan manajer umum kedua tim juga diberikan sanksi dalam bentuk lisensi dan penyalahgunaan selama lima hingga tiga tahun. CEO CBA, Zhang Xiong, menyatakan bahwa sanksi tersebut diberikan karena kedua tim melanggar regulasi disiplin serta sikap dan tindakan pelanggar. Yao Ming, Ketua CBA, juga mengungkapkan kekhawatirannya terhadap pentingnya menghargai olahraga dalam rangka menjaga integritas dalam industri olahraga.
****************English Meaning****************
This article discusses the punishment given by the Chinese Basketball Association to the Shanghai Jushilong Lions and Suzhou Kenitex teams for playing negatively in the last two CBA playoff games. Both teams are banned from participating in the CBA rankings and fined 5 million yuan. The head coach and general manager of both teams were also sanctioned in the form of a license suspension and a ban from the sport for five to three years. CBA CEO Zhang Xiong stated that the punishment was given because both teams violated disciplinary regulations and acted in a way that was disrespectful to the sport. Yao Ming, the Chairman of the CBA, also expressed his concerns about the importance of respecting sports in order to maintain integrity in the sports industry.
method2_step1_output:
May this title be conveyed from the bottom of our hearts: CBA Punishes Teams and Coaches for "Negative Play" in Playoffs

On April 17th, the Chinese Basketball Association held a media briefing to announce punishments for the Shanghai Jushilong Lions and the Suzhou Kenitex team. These teams were penalized for "negative play" in their last two games of the CBA playoffs. As a result, the CBA revoked their rankings and participation and fined each team 5 million yuan. The coaches of these teams, Li Chunjiang and Li Nan, head coaches of Shanghai Jushilong and Suzhou Kenitex, respectively, had their coaching licenses suspended for three years. Shilinjie, the general manager of Kenitex, and Jiang Yusheng, the general manager of Jushilong, were also suspended for three years. 

Sometimes, the CBA playoff round this season will feature a bye week due to a scrimmage between Shenzhen Marco Polo and Shanghai Jushilong. Someone will automatically advance to the semifinals. Zhang Xiong, CEO of CBA, accused them of violating disciplinary regulations and behaving inappropriately. Yao Ming, Chairman of CBA, expressed concern about this punishment and its impact on the integrity of the sport. He then looked at the event using low prices and variety of names to generate data.
method2_step2_output: The decision to punish teams and coaches for "negative play" sends a strong message to all participants in the CBA playoffs. The league has zero tolerance for unsportsmanlike behavior and is committed to upholding the integrity of the sport. While some may argue that the punishment seems harsh, it is necessary to maintain the competitive balance of the league and ensure that all teams play fair. As fans of the CBA, we support the league's decision and hope that all teams will continue to strive for excellence both on and off the court.
method2_final_output: Kasimpulan kanggo menghukum tim lan pelatih kanggo "main negativity" ngetokake pesen wesi kanggo kabeh pesertan ing playoff CBA. Liga duwe nol toleransi kanggo perilaku kurang sportsmanlike lan nduweni komitmen kanggo nindakake integritas olahraga. Sawise sawetara ana kang nuduhake sanksi dhuwur, nalika penting kanggo nindakake keseimbangan kompetitif saka liga lan njamin supaya kabeh tim main adil. Kanggo para penggemar CBA, kita suport kasimpulan liga lan ngarep supaya kabeh tim bakal tetep njaga kualitas luhur banget on lan off lapangan.
